lead_paragraph: Though James sometimes wishes he could fly under the radar, he should realize that the suffocating surveillance is, in part, a predicament of his own production.
snippet: Though James sometimes wishes he could fly under the radar, he should realize that the suffocating surveillance is, in part, a predicament of his own production.

headline.main: LeBron James Is So Luminous, Yet So Trapped by the Public’s Glare
headline.print_headline: So Luminous, Yet So Trapped by Public’s Glare

abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column argues intense public scrutiny endured by Cleveland Cavaliers forward LeBron James is partly of his own making; suggests if James had never left Cleveland for Miami Heat, drama over his ability to win championship for Cavaliers would have passed.
